name: Dark Siren
description:
※Sex is not included. Please note.

"It's strange. According to the schedule, we should have already arrived at our destination..."
"God, watch over us."

As you wake up and wake up, you can see the Dark Siren wandering around inside the empty ship looking for you.
What the hell happened here?

[How to play]
Find the notes left by the sailors throughout the ship, uncover the truth about what happened here, and escape.
You must stay alert and look around carefully to avoid being charmed by the Dark Siren.
If you are caught and enchanted by the Dark Siren 3 times, the game will be over.

[Game Features]
▷ Charming characters
▷ Suspenseful play
▷ Simple operation
▷ Game Mode: Normal Mode, Hard Mode
▷ Various skins that can be unlocked while playing
▷ 6 achievements
